projects.projectDescription: A productivity and task management application that allows for easy task generation and task state management. Tasks are persistent with the use of local-storage and can be filtered, updated, and cancelled. Desktop, laptop, and mobile resolutions are supported.

A demo e-commerce application which includes a company page, products page, checkout, and contact form. Total costs are updated live, and discount can be applied with enough spending. Desktop, laptop, and mobile resolutions are supported.

A basic weather-forecast SPA, using WeatherAPI and location-services to provide a three-day weather forecast for your local area (or Melbourne as default). Application includes custom messages based on weather statuses, and is supported on desktops, laptops, and mobile devices.
A resume-building SPA, built to showcase React fundamentals. Includes state-management, and input validation. Currently only supported on desktop and laptop resolutions.
An SPA recreation of the 'Discord' website homepage. The recreation includes accurate layout styling, fonts, graphics, animations, and content. Desktop, laptop, and mobile resolutions are supported.
